codam-norminette.command.description:
Specifies norminette command, example: > norminette -R CheckForbiddenSourceHeader < for Piscine Day00-09 
 defaults to norminette

codam-norminette.command2.description:
Specifies secondary norminette command, example: > python ~/norminette+/run.py < for norminette+ 
 no default since not everyone has norminette+

codam-norminette.fileregex.description:
Specifies which c file to run norminette on 
 defaults to \.[ch]$

codam-norminette.fileregex2.description:
Specifies which files to run the secondary norminette command on 
 defaults to (\.[c])|Makefile|makefile|GNUmakefile$
